The Internship program runs full-time from May 25th 2026 - August 28th 2026. About oxio At oxio, we're not just building another internet company; we are building the future of the Internet. We believe in transparency, simplicity, and putting our customers first. As part of our team, you'll be disrupting the industry in an environment that values agility, innovation, and collaboration. The Team: The "Smooth Operators" You will join the oxio Systems Squad, also known as the "Smooth Operators". We are the team responsible for the core digital assets that power our brand, including the oxio.ca website, the Customer Portal, and the Buyflow. Our mission is to empower customers through reliable, intuitive digital-first services that "just work". Role Overview We are looking for a tech-savvy, curious, and driven undergraduate student to support our Agile squad. This is a unique hybrid role where you will wear multiple hats-ranging from Quality Assurance (QA) and Content Management to light Development. You will work closely with our Digital Product Manager, UI Designer, and Developers, gaining hands-on experience in how a modern digital product team operates. Key Responsibilities • QA & Testing: Act as a quality champion by testing new functionalities and features to ensure they meet requirements and provide a seamless user experience before release. • Content Management: Take ownership of content updates and maintenance tasks for the oxio.ca website using our CMS. • Development Support: Collaborate with our frontend and full-stack developers to tackle smaller, less complex coding tasks (exposure to modern stacks like NextJS). • Squad Collaboration: Assist with backlog organization, design asset preparation, and daily workflow management. • Agile Participation: Join us for our ceremonies, such as the daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and showcases, to learn how we deliver value iteratively. Why Join Us? • Real Impact: You won't just be fetching coffee; you will help ship features that real customers use every day. • Mentorship: Work side-by-side with experienced developers and product leaders who are dedicated to your growth. • Culture: Experience a workplace that prioritizes transparency and simplicity.
